title: How do I synchronize contacts and calendar events?
answer:
To synchronize contacts, you have log in to at least one Exchange account. 

 On the NEW ACCOUNT screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112820). Obtain the email box server's configuration from your email service provider's website, configure the settings, and log in to your Exchange account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112821) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112822)

 Go to Settings. Under ACCOUNTS, touch Corporate. Touch your account and select the data you want to synchronize. Touch the menu key. From the displayed option menu, choose Sync now to synchronize the selected data to your phone. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112823) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112824)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112825) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112826) 

 If the contact synchronization fails, check that your phone's data service is turned on and that the account server supports contact synchronization.
